title: D2C Hackathon 2024
description: Join us for an exciting hackathon focused on Direct-to-Consumer innovations. Build the next generation of D2C solutions and compete for amazing prizes!

title: Freshers Party for Batch 2024
description: Join us for an exciting Freshers Party for Batch 2024. Get to know your batchmates and have a great time!

title: E-sports Tournament
description: Register for the E-sports Tournament and compete with your friends in a variety of games. Amazing prizes to be won!
